question: You have seen an advertisement in an English newspaper for a job in the City Museum shop during the holidays.You decide to apply for the job. Write a letter to the director of the Museum.In your letter:Introduce yourselfExplain what experience and special skills you haveExplain why you are interested in the job
text: I am writing this letter with regards to the vacancy of an accountant which was published in the Times of India editorial on 26th Feb 2022. I certainly believe that my credentials are  suitable for the position and I would be obliged if I am given an opportunity to work in the organization.

At the outset, I am a master in advertisement and have  seven years of experience in the Navbhara times where I was working  as a chief editor and was responsible for updating the obituaries column. Furthermore, I am fluent in English and French which is also my native language and hence it would be an edge over other applications.
Secondly, I am very keen to work with TOI because of the brand value and the Employee friendly policies. Apparently, it is one the finest company where everyone perceives themselves as retiring.
Kindly consider my CV for the open position. I am available at any time in the next week for an interview process.
Looking forward to a positive response from you.
